ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Fabian quest still broken
ygData.msgSnippet: I was dumb enough to give him my lute strings and he ate them. I spent 7 hours in NK today, got the guts, turned them in and got Lute Strings.  He gave me
ygData.messageBody:
I was dumb enough to give him my lute strings and he ate them.
I spent 7 hours in NK today, got the guts, turned them in and got Lute
Strings. He gave me 12silver and 1gold. Also got + "Bard" faction.
Seems like it's still broken. Sent a full report + Screenshot to
eqtesting@.... Maybe i'll get lucky and they'll reimburse my
quest pieces. Yea right.

Ninev Rudeflute
35 and loving track but hating Verant in house QA
E'ci

--- Keith Mann <keith@...> wrote:
> Hrm. I hailed him and got no response, so I said "Hello Fabian" and
> he asked for some money. I turned to the barkeeper to get some change
>
> for him, and suddenly I'm dubious to Freeport residents. My faction
> was good before. Anyone else had this problem?
>
> [34 Bard] Mannerism Dirgesinger (Half Elf) <Intrepid Spirit> SERVER:
> The Rathe
>
>
>
>
